MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark, affecting properties in Riverside Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have restored supplies to some properties and have been working through the night to locate an underground cable fault.  We now expect all supplies to be restored in stages by 4.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.35am on the 5th of April 2021.
